summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 3.3°C) and outside temperature (up 2.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 2.9 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1771 m), light levels (up 5625 lux), and inside temperature (up 2.3°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 187.2m lower than yesterday, 671.7m lower than the past week, 1771.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 713m to 1594m and averaged 879.7m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and winds will be practically absent. Light to moderate rain is forecast, occasional overcast conditions, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Weather could become unsettled.
